entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this evening then cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023
